name: Do Androids Dream: GWJ #55 Edition
description:
Original submission to Godot Wild Jam #55
Hear the dreams of the android shepherd after a day of herding his flock, and decide, are these dreams real?

Thanks to ChatGPT 3.5 Turbo for the dreams.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD.

Spacebar for magnetism

Credits:

Programming: Maaack, tomy 
Pixel Art: CatGutsNightmare 
Music and SFX: mikezimean
